page.title: 17HOME LIFE IN CONGLETON
page.content: {Meals}.For breakfast we usually have cereals or toast.To drink we have coffee or fruit juice.Dinner is usually eaten at school e.g chips, meat and vegetables,drink and dessert. On Sundays we have a main family meal, this meal usually consists of potatoes,meat,vegetables e.g carrots, peas and cauliflower etc.A drink with the Sunday meal would usually be a tablewine.Family pets.A dog or a cat can be owned as a pet but some people go for more exotic animals such as lizards or snakes.Hobbies.People have hobbies to pass the time and help them relax.Such things as scale model making,knitting and flower arranging. More active hobbies are sports and BMX racing.Television is a source of entertainment.People also go to cinemas or read books.
